name: Sr. Environmental Graphic Designer · San Clemente
job__description: RSM Design is looking to start a dialogue with environmental graphic designers with the below qualifications. We are looking for talented individuals to join our San Clemente studio.
column10:
JOB ROLES:

RSM Design is seeking a highly creative self-motivated designer to be a part of our San Clemente
column11: CA studio and who has a strong conceptual through design detailing knowledge and can problem solve both internally and externally.  The candidate will assist in all phases of project design and development including; programming
column17:
and have strong experiences with EGD and architectural projects from conceptual development through implementation.


SKILL REQUIREMENTS:

  • Bachelor’s degree in graphic design
column19:
or related field.
  • 5+ years’ experience in the environmental graphic design field
column20:
or related field.
  • Strong knowledge of and use of Adobe Creative Suite programs and CAD Tools and ability to visualize in two and three dimensions a must.
  • Knowledge in 3D rendering skills in Sketch-up or similar a plus.
  • Understanding of architectural scales and drawings - able to read and interpret architectural and shop drawings.
  • Collaborative designer with good communication skills that works well in an interdisciplinary
column22:
as well as ability to work autonomously.
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills and experienced with client presentation skills and the ability to manage client expectations with clear communications and confident leadership.
  • Desire and ability to travel to out of town project locations.
  • Candidate must be willing to relocate to the San Clemente area. 


    • ADDITIONAL NOTES:

    • Salary commensurate based on experience and ability level
    • This is a full-time position with excellent benefits
    • Applicant must be willing to engage in travel to client meetings
column24:
and possibly to the other RSM studios. 
  • Interested applicants please email a letter of interest
column26:
and portfolio and project examples to careers@rsmdesign.com


ABOUT US:

RSM Design is an award-winning international architectural graphics design firm. We specialize in branding
column32: and placemaking. RSM Design’s studios are located in San Clemente
column34:
and Los Angeles. 

Our team works at the intersection of graphic design and architecture
column37:
and the various consultants to choreograph the guest experience and beyond. The studio’s project collaborations range in scope and scale from complex urban programs to small unique branding opportunities on high-profile domestic and international projects.

Check us out at www.rsmdesign.com.

name: Jr. Environmental Graphic Designer · Dallas
job__description: RSM Design is looking to hire an environmental graphic designer with 1-3 years of experience and the listed qualifications. We are looking for talented individuals to join the Dallas Texas studio.
column10:
JOB ROLES:

So you’ve been wanting to join a collaborative design studio with great opportunities for creative growth and leadership? RSM Design is the studio. We’re seeking a highly creative experienced architectural graphic designer (i.e. – environmental or experiential graphic designer) to be a part of our Dallas studio
column11: located in the dynamic Bishop Arts neighborhood. You should have strong conceptual
column14: and be willing to assist in all phases of the project design and development including: visioning
column18:
and implementation.


SKILL REQUIREMENTS:

  • Bachelor’s degree in graphic design
column20:
or similar related design field
  • 1 - 3 years of experience with environmental or architectural graphic design
  • Strong knowledge of and use of Adobe Creative Suite programs
  • Skill in 3D rendering programs such as Sketch-up or similar
  • Familiarity with using architectural drawings
  • Collaborative designer that works well in an interdisciplinary environment
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills
  • Experience with client presentations and the ability to manage client expectations
  • Desire and ability to travel to out-of-town project locations
  • Shoes optional. Creativity a must. 


    • ADDITIONAL NOTES:

    • Salary commensurate based on experience and ability level
    • This is a full-time position with excellent benefits
    • Applicant must be willing to engage in travel to client meetings
column22:
and possibly to the other RSM studios. 
  • Interested applicants please email a letter of interest
column24:
and portfolio and project examples to careers@rsmdesign.com


ABOUT US:

RSM Design works at the intersection of graphic design and architecture
column25: collaborating with teams to choreograph the guest experience. Our studio’s projects range in scope and scale from complex urban wayfinding programs to unique branding opportunities to community art pieces. The studios specialize in branding
column31: and placemaking. For the past 25 years we have created designs internationally from our studios in Dallas
column33: and Los Angeles.  Check us out at www.rsmdesign.com.
